parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per diagnosis per subject (for unscheduled deaths only)

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DDSEQ

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89966

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in DDTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in DDTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). DDTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. In this domain the value should always be DEATHD.
datasetVariables.label: Death Diagnosis Short Name
datasetVariables.name: DDTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89965

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for DDTESTCD. The value in DDTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. In this domain, the value should always be "Death Diagnosis".
datasetVariables.label: Death Diagnosis Name
datasetVariables.name: DDTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the diagnosis of the subject's cause of death, as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: DDORRES

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the diagnosis information, copied or derived from DDORRES in a standard format. Examples: UNKNOWN, GAVAGE ERROR.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: DDSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDRESCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to categorize the result of a finding. Examples: TREATMENT RELATED, NONTREATMENT RELATED, UNDETERMINED, ACCIDENTAL, etc.
datasetVariables.label: Result Category
datasetVariables.name: DDRESCAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Examples: TOX PATHOLOGIST, PEER REVIEW, SPONSOR, VETERINARIAN.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: DDEVAL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of the diagnosis, in ISO 8601 format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/time of Diagnosis
datasetVariables.name: DDDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable DD.DDDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of the diagnosis, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Diagnosis
datasetVariables.name: DDDY

description: An events domain that contains the diagnosis of the cause of death for a subject. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C95087, 2018-06-29)
label: Death Diagnosis
name: DD
